tool_description: An API in Node.js that will return anime facts
name: Anime Facts
title: Anime Facts

api_list.name: Get all the available anime’s list
api_list.description: Get all the available anime’s list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-facts.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-facts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-facts.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-facts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
